item.title: DANGER to public. Broken fence with exposed barbed wire, next to public path., 9th September
item.description:
Small grassed area on A345 near roundabout that turns to Sapphire Road. The wooden fence (serves no purpose) is broken in several places with exposed sharps and exposed barbed wire.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Cherry Blossom Close, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 9th September
item.description:
Hi, the drain opposite to 90 Pennine Road. They seem to clear the opposite one in the roundabout but not the other side. Everytime heavy rainfall the roundabout is flooding and rising more each time. I believe it hasn’t been cleaned out in years. I’m not sure if they are aware there are two drains in the roundabout road. I have lived here 4 years and it’s been hapoening
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, Pennine Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car driving over kerb and causing damage to verge, especially when wet weather arrives. I have reported this before . Located at 5 Howards place. Not sure if they had planning permission to turn front garden in to a car park., 9th September
item.description:
Problem at 5 Howard’s Place, Hucclecote rd Damage to verge due to their car driving over verge to access their garden.in the winter months the mud from the wheels cover the footpath in front of their property

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 83, Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Increase in traffic using School Road as a quick way to get to London Road, especially now with the road closure has been significant! This is an access road only for residents, 9th September
item.description:
This will become dangerous when the ford is fast flowing during the bad weather and cars can’t reverse
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Lyefield Road East, Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 9th September
item.description:
28 day with 2 way traffic lights plus temporary footway closure please lift and replace x1 broken manhole cover in footway 550x550mm stats required. (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrowth stopping access and flytipping, 9th September
item.description:
The entire network of alleyways that run behind the school and along the side of the estate are in terrible condition. Overgrown vegetation is blocking access and because it looks such a mess people are fly tipping in all public pathways. This is an ongoing problem and should be cared for along side grass cutting etc.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springbank Road, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This stretch of road has had water running down it for months, 9th September
item.description:
With the approach of winter this steep downhill narrow road wil become a sheet of ice and very dangerous on occasion. It has been in this condition for months.It is impossible to control a car in frosty weather,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 9th September
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AND TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE PLEASE CUT BACK OVERGROWN TREE BRANCHES HANGING OVER FOOTWAY APPROXIMATELY 2 METERS X3 METERS TO MAKE SAFE (Overgrown Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet
